interpretation: The Muted Speaker card represents silence, secrecy, and the need for peace and quiet. It suggests that it is time to tune out distractions and listen to your inner voice. This card can also indicate a need for privacy or a desire to keep something hidden. It is a reminder to be cautious with your words and to be mindful of the impact they may have on others. In some cases, this card may suggest a need for meditation or introspection. It is important to take time to reflect and recharge before moving forward.
